bilingual.source: He keeps fighting to help the weak and never gives up.
bilingual.target: 他不断战斗帮助弱者，从不放弃。

bilingual.source: He is fighting to protect his family.
bilingual.target: 他在战斗以保护他的家人。

bilingual.source: Night fighting adds complexity to the battle.
bilingual.target: 夜战增加了战斗的复杂性。

bilingual.source: The villagers are fighting against the invaders.
bilingual.target: 村民们在与入侵者战斗。

bilingual.source: The two countries have been fighting for years.
bilingual.target: 这两个国家已经战斗了多年。

bilingual.source: The soldiers are fighting bravely on the front line.
bilingual.target: 士兵们在前线英勇地战斗。

bilingual.source: The game involves fighting against various monsters.
bilingual.target: 这个游戏涉及与各种怪物战斗。

bilingual.source: Many veterans still remember fighting the japs.
bilingual.target: 许多老兵仍然记得与日本鬼子的战斗。

bilingual.source: The barbarians were known for their fierce fighting skills.
bilingual.target: 野蛮人以其凶猛的战斗技巧而闻名。

list.abstract: Fighting，英语词语，意思是战斗、好战的，也表示加油，如《浪漫满屋》里英宰和智恩相互鼓励的话。

yingyinNormal.en: Today this ancient fighting tradition is not just part of Chinese folk law, but has seeped into western popular culture too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当今这个古老的战斗传统已经不仅仅是中国的民间习俗，它也浸润了西方流行文化。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what are you fighting about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们到底是为什么事而争吵的？

yingyinNormal.en: What's the cause you're fighting for?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们为之而战的信念是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Two of the hottest chicks are fighting over you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两个极品小妞正在争着要你呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I take it this is me you're fighting about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们应该是在为我争吵吧？

yingyinNormal.en: 20 years of fighting criminals amounts to nothing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 二十年的打击犯罪经历还不算什么吗？

yingyinNormal.en: All those years wasted fighting each other Charles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 查尔斯，我们浪费了好多年的时间相互斗争。

yingyinNormal.en: Little K, fighting for what's his. It's a good one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小朋友保护自己玩具的故事。这故事不错。

yingyinNormal.en: Kites, ho. We're heading out for some kite fighting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风筝嗬。我们准备去斗风筝。

yingyinNormal.en: As I've said before, fighting this disease will take time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正如我之前所说的，战胜这一疾病将需要时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Kite fighting? Oh, yeah. It's an extremely competitive, cutthroat sport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斗风筝？对，一项极具竞争性和激烈性的运动。

yingyinNormal.en: And every patriot fighting for a cause, they're only as strong as the cause they're fighting for.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而所有为信念而战的爱国者，他们为之奋战的信念决定了他们有多强大。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I guess I just like to know who I'm fighting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个嘛，好歹知道对手是谁了。

yingyinNormal.en: I just thought it was kinda cool. What was? Fighting crime as a family.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是觉得那样很酷。怎样？一家人打击犯罪。

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking, you know, we have a surplus of dragon-fighting Vikings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直在想村里的屠龙高手已经够多了。

yingyinNormal.en: So he's not fighting all change, then? No, but he likes proper research.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说，他也不是反对一切变化。对，但他需要充分研究。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the luckiest baby in the whole world. I'm sorry, you were fighting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他真是全天下最幸福的宝宝。抱歉，你们正在吵架。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, listen to me complaining while your husband is fighting for his life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你丈夫正在与死神搏斗，你还得听我抱怨。

yingyinNormal.en: How will your friends have time for me when they are so busy fighting you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你跟朋友们反目成仇，他们就没时间来找我了。

yingyinNormal.en: I won't commit our troops to fighting another ground war in Iraq, or in Syria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我承诺不会让我们的部队再次参加伊拉克或叙利亚战争。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 打架；打斗；争吵；吵架；（fight的现在分词）
n. 打斗的人；战士；拳击运动员；战斗机；奋斗者；不轻易服输的人；好斗者

word_family.mean: v. 打架；斗殴；反对；争吵；争论；斗嘴；挤出一条路；打；参；指挥

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Fighting</highlight> Temeraire was thought the best painting in Britain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《战舰无畏号》被认为是英国最好的画。

examination_example.sentence: This painting is called The <highlight>Fighting</highlight> Temeraire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这幅画被称为《战斗铁美拉》。

examination_example.sentence: Turner painted The <highlight>Fighting</highlight> Temeraire when he was quite old, so perhaps he wanted to show the sun setting on his own life, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 特纳在他很老的时候画了《战斗铁美拉》，所以也许他也想表现他自己生命中的落日。
